"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const csharp_1 = require("csharp");
class PhysicsTools {
    //射线检测
    static rayCast(origin, direction, hitInfo, maxDistance, layerMask = 0) {
        var v1 = csharp_1.GameUtils.ViewExtensionMethods.initVec3(origin.x, origin.y, origin.z);
        var v2 = csharp_1.GameUtils.ViewExtensionMethods.initVec3(direction.x, direction.y, direction.z);
        return csharp_1.UnityEngine.Physics.Raycast(v1, v2, hitInfo, maxDistance, layerMask);
    }
    //初始化hitInfo
    static createHitInfo() {
        return new csharp_1.UnityEngine.RaycastHit();
    }
    static createRay(origin, direction) {
        return new csharp_1.UnityEngine.Ray(origin, direction);
    }
}
exports.default = PhysicsTools;
